/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. Cars are parked neatly along the sides of the street, adding to the urban charm of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the busy street below. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
